query:
SELECT s.id, s.siteNumber, s.description, sc.name as centreName, 
       GROUP_CONCAT(uc.name SEPARATOR ', ') as permittedCategories
FROM sites s
JOIN shopping_centres sc ON s.centreId = sc.id
LEFT JOIN site_usage_categories suc ON s.id = suc.siteId
LEFT JOIN usage_categories uc ON suc.categoryId = uc.id
WHERE sc.name LIKE '%Eastgate%' AND s.siteNumber = '2'
GROUP BY s.id, s.siteNumber, s.description, sc.name;

       GROUP_CONCAT(uc.name SEPARATOR ', ') as permittedCategories
FROM sites s
JOIN shopping_centres sc ON s.centreId = sc.id
LEFT JOIN site_usage_categories suc ON s.id = suc.siteId
LEFT JOIN usage_categories uc ON suc.categoryId = uc.id
WHERE sc.name LIKE '%Eastgate%' AND s.siteNumber = '2'
GROUP BY s.id, s.siteNumber, s.description, sc.name;
